segments.text: The kitchen is in such disarray with water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the sink overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor must be so slippery and dangerous by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been doing this behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing so precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried for him, he might fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager to get a cookie, it's almost cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me feel a bit uneasy and concerned.
segments.speaker: PAR
